objects.text:
Premium gold-plated curved design • Double row of lustrous pearls
Unique wave silhouette • Secure post-back closure
Elegant reflection effect • Perfect for special occasions

product_details.name: Luxe Pearl Wave Gold-Plated Hoop Earrings - Timeless Elegance
product_details.description:
• Premium gold-plated curved design for sophisticated style
• Double row of lustrous faux pearls adding classic glamour
• Unique wave silhouette offering modern contemporary appeal
• Secure post-back closure for comfortable all-day wear
• Perfect blend of classic pearls and modern gold finish
• Versatile design suitable for both formal and casual occasions
• Elegant reflection effect enhancing visual appeal
• Durable construction ensuring long-lasting beauty
• Lightweight and comfortable design for extended wear
• Ideal accessory for special events, weddings, or daily wear

banner_details:
The banner showcases a luxurious jewelry promotion centered around a pair of elegant pearl-embellished hoop earrings. It features a sophisticated background with a golden radial gradient and soft wave accents, overlaid with subtle glowing and decorative circle strokes to create depth. At the top lies a bold, serif-styled main headline (id: heading), followed by a modern sans-serif subheading (id: subheading). The product image (id: product_image) is centered and flanked by a reflection effect. A detailed product description (id: description) sits below the image, followed by the price label (id: price), a gold rectangular call-to-action button (id: cta_button) with white text (id: cta), and a tagline (id: tagline) at the bottom.

**Color Palette**:  
- #D4AF37 (Royal Gold)  
- #F5E3C6 (Champagne Beige)  
- #8B6914 (Dark Mustard Brown)  
- #5D4411 (Deep Bronze)  
- #FFFFFF (White)
product_color: The product image showcases elegant gold hoop earrings adorned with pearl beading. The color palette primarily features a rich metallic gold (#D4AF37), which dominates the design and adds a luxurious, high-end feel. Complementing it are soft pearl whites (#F9F6F2) that highlight the detailing, lending a touch of delicacy and refinement. Hints of warm brown reflections (#8B6C3D) naturally occur in the gold's shadowed areas, enhancing the texture and dimension. The colors blend smoothly due to the metallic shine, while the high contrast between the gleaming gold and the matte pearl beads ensures each element stands out distinctly, making it perfect for upscale advertisement visuals.
